thread.section_title: Munchery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Munchery | www.munchery.com
thread.title: Bradford N. Hull
thread.title_full: Munchery reviewed by Bradford N. Hull

author: Bradford N. Hull
title: Bradford N. Hull
text: We tried ordering dinners for both of us and we are delighted! There portion sizes are appropriately generous and meals came with a complete ingredient list and the percentage of daily nutrition requirements met. And instructions for heating (if required) both for microwave and oven. We will be ordering again soon.
